attributes.action: Introduce Compulsory Covid Vaccination to all MPs/Lords
attributes.additional_details: As you are forcing care staff to have it, it is only right that your MPs/Lords have it too
attributes.background: As you are Mandating Compulsory Covid Vaccines for care staff you can make it compulsory for all MPs/Lords to have it as well.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/583052

Decisions about any rules regarding vaccination for members of the House of Lords would be a matter for that House.
